title: Which are the best digital forensic companies in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many companies in the digital forensic space in India. Typically the digital forensic work is done when there is a need to retrieve the evidence from the electronic devices such as computers, dvds, pen drives or mobile phones. There are two dominant players in this space though there are many other local companies in the different parts of India. ForensicGuru is the company based in New Delhi and are associated with AccessData software. They have other products under their umbrella which helps them to work with the companies looking for services. Lab Systems on the other hand is Mumbai based dominant player in Digital forensics in India. They have been working in this domain since last 2 decades. They are associated with investigations of many hi-profile cases in India. They are associated with the Encase software company of USA.
